title: CF Ribamontán al Mar
text:
Club de Fútbol Ribamontán al Mar is a <a href="List%20of%20football%20clubs%20in%20Spain">football</a> team based in <a href="Galizano">Galizano</a>, <a href="Ribamont%C3%A1n%20al%20Mar">Ribamontán al Mar</a> in the autonomous community of <a href="Cantabria">Cantabria</a>. Founded in 1971, the team plays in <a href="Tercera%20Divisi%C3%B3n">Tercera División – Group 3</a>. The club's home ground is "<a href="Estadio%20Bace%C3%B1uela">Baceñuela</a>", which has a capacity of 3,000 spectators. 
History.
In the <a href="2018%E2%80%9319%20Tercera%20Divisi%C3%B3n">2018-19 season</a> the club appeared in Tercera División after a four-years break, spent in Regional leagues. This season the club managed to remain its place in Tercera División, Group 3 by finishing 11th.
